name: Fantasma
description: Fantasma is a Psychological Horror for 2-4 players that tests your nerves against the paranormal. As a group of thrill seekers in a ghost hunting community- prepare and coordinate a plan that will lead you and your team through haunted locations using a variety of specially designed ghost hunting equipment and techniques. Encounter spectral beings and escape with your life to upgrade your equipment and increase your reputation among the few who make contact with the fantasmic and live to tell about it.
